title: Une Partie de Campagne = a Day in the Country
abstract: Notes: Adapted from a short story by Guy de Maupassant.
description: In this bitter-sweet Maupassant vignette set in 1860, a Parisian merchant takes his family for a day in the country. The picnic and a seduction form the centre of the tale. Renoir replaces Maupassant's detached observation with a celebration of nature. While an impressionistic sense of transcience is perfectly captured, it is Renoir's clear perception of character aided by Kosma's music that generates the film's depth of feeling.  Credits: Producer, Pierre Braunberger ; director, writer, Jean Renoir ; photography, Claude Renoir, Jean Bourgoin ; assistants, Luchino Visconti,  Jacques Becker, Henri Cartier-Bresson ; music, Joseph Kosma ; editor, Marguerite Renoir. Cast: Sylvia Bataille, Georges Darnoux, Jeanne Marken, Gabriello, .
